about_me_description: Well, well, well... What can I say about myself? I know very well that no one reads the "About Me" section 😆, but I'll still try to tell you a bit about myself.

looking_for_opportunities_title.false: I'm not looking for new opportunities right now 💼

interest_description: If you looked just below my name, you can see that I’m a full-stack developer. I have a strong interest in emerging technologies, and if you have sharp eyes 👀 🤣, you’ll notice that I’m passionate about finance 💰 and cryptocurrencies 💎.
mobile_toast_description: View on desktop for full experience details
